name: Caravan Endures Vision Accessible version
description:
The Caravan Endures is a collaborative TTRPG designed to teach teens teamwork, planning, and communication skills. Set in a unique Western meets Fantasy world, it embodies the idea of gentle fantasy, encouraging players to find peaceful solutions to encounters rather than violence. Designed by long time applied Dungeon Master Peter Jung, it uses tools that have been successful in a number of autism based social skills groups to encourage collaboration and build positive interaction for teens who face social difficulties, while also including tools to help build additional talents including journaling and identifying stressful situations.

Accessibility tools:

* Typeface with high readability * Large text size * Image descriptions * Removed backgrounds for better contrast * Chapter and section tags for buyers who use screen readers * Changed tables for lists, also for players who use screen readers * Lists are labeled exhaustively so as to not lose the functionality from the tables * High contrast, high brightness images
